column1:
share on x df debbie frye. jun 13 at 3:06 pm so sorry for our loss of eloise. i am sure she is enjoying the family reunion that was there to greet her as she walked through those gates of pearl! i can just see that big ol' smile on her face!! she's got a lot of hugging to catch up on!! please know prayers are going up for strength & comfort for all those she leaves here. love to all. debbie (mink & christine's daughter)comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x pj patsy james. jun 13 at 12:57 pm all of you are in my prayers. love to all. patsy(campbell) james. mona's sister. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 14. 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm rudder funeral home - stevenson45015 al hwy 277. stevenson, al, us, 35772. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. funeral service. jun 15. 12:00 pm rudder funeral home - stevenson45015 al hwy 277. stevenson, al, us, 35772. get order flowers now for virginia eloise's funeral service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook rudder funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
